nodes.bodyText: Why are our tags excluded here?
because we got some "all including tags" like "exclusion lists for crafters" where a lot of random items are matched together.
Make that a config then. Cause there are a lot of tags which have that property potentially.

Not disable tags from all mods.
But allow tags to be specifically excluded.
See Aequivaleos vanilla plugin on how todo that, since that already filters on tags.

                    ("minestuck:ore_cruxite",
                      "minestuck:ore_uranium"),
           s -> s instanceof String);
+
+        disabledModTags = defineList(builder, "disabledmodtags",
+          Collections.singletonList("minecolonies"),

nodes.bodyText: Meh, that would become a large list we always have to extend every time we add a new crafter. I rather not do that.

nodes.bodyText:
I rather you would. This already makes no sense since minecraft itself has both collective and functional tags.
So make the distinction on tag level please.
Possibly with a mod wide override.
